title.rendered: An Unforgettable Day of Empowerment with Jada Pinkett Smith to Support New Memoir “Worthy”

content.rendered:
jada Pinkett Smith

l-r, Kandi Burress-Tucker, Yandy Smith-Harris, Nikkia McClain, Latoya Bond, Tamika Mallory, Kimberly A. Blackwell, Ashley Antoinette Coleman and Lu-Shawn M. Thompson

A special invite-only event surrounding the author’s renowned book “Worthy”

I wrote this book with love, not only love for Black Women, but for Black Men as well, including my Husband!”

— Jada Pinkett Smith

ATLANTA, GA, USA, October 24, 2023 /EINPresswire.com/ — Yesterday, October 23, 2023, women from diverse fields like business, social justice, media, medicine, and entertainment convened in Atlanta for “A Worthy Conversation.” The spotlight was on the actress and new book author Jada Pinkett Smith. This exclusive gathering, co-hosted by influential women including Tamika D. Mallory, Kimberly A. Blackwell, Latoya T. Bond, Kandi Burress-Tucker, Nikkia McClain, Yandy Smith-Harris, and Lu-Shawn M. Thompson, was a moment of inspiration and empowerment.

The private event, tailored for 100 women, started with a beautiful cocktail reception with light bites, an open bar, networking, and live entertainment by GoldToothTruthandTheShine. The reception was followed by a sit-down and unapologetic discussion between Pinkett Smith and Blackwell, who discussed the memoir in detail as nothing was off limits during the conversation. Smith shared her struggles with self-worth, emphasizing the importance of having a voice and loving oneself. Attendees experience a heart-warming bond of sisterhood during the event, honoring the new author and allowing the women in the room to love and pour back into Smith.

“I wrote this book with love, not only love for Black Women, but for Black Men as well, including my Husband!” – Jada Pinkett Smith

The incredible women who graced the event were encouraged to wear shades of melanin. In addition, they had the opportunity to purchase two personally signed copies of the inspiring book. This gathering showed unwavering support for Smith and indeed saw her for the sensational person she is. The thought-provoking discussion during “A Worthy Conversation” enriched everyone who attended with an understanding of the book and left with profound insights.

To preview the event photos, click here.

Nikkia McClain
Tene Nicole Creative Agency
+1 646-244-2140
email us here

A Worthy Conversation with Jada Pinkett-Smith

You just read:

News Provided By

October 24, 2023, 22:55 GMT
